translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_8: processing and administering your insurance policies for which we act as your agent;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_9: Offering you services relating to your insurance policy
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_11: contacting you in compliance with the law; and,
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_13: We will limit the Personal Information we collect about you to that which is needed to meet these purposes. We will only retain your Personal Information as long as we need it to meet these purposes.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_14: Please be aware that, as part of our use of your Personal Information, we may transfer it for processing in jurisdictions outside of North America, which may not have laws that provide privacy protections that are substantially similar to those in North America.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_15: Will Personal Information be disclosed to others?
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_16: We will only disclose your Personal Information to:
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_17: independent contractors of Goose or your Insurer to investigate, assist with, or adjudicate your claim;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_18: consumer reporting agencies as governed by the law;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_19: any other third party, if authorized to do so by the law; and,
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_20: any other third party, if you provide us with your express consent to do so.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_23: when you sign up for an account;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_24: from all written and electronic communications that you have with us;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_25: when you use our mobile applications and/or website (the “Platform”);
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_26: from any publicly or commercially available sources of information;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_27: from Facebook and/or Google with your consent;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_28: from your contacts or friends lists with your consent; and,
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_29: from consumer reporting agencies with your consent as required by the law.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_30: For greater clarity, we collect the following Personal Information when using our Platform:
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_31: the general or precise location of your device;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_32: the device that you are using, including its unique identifiers, installed applications, and phone or internet service provider; and,
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_33: the interactions that you have with the Platform, including the pages that you visit and the content that you view.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_34: By volunteering your Personal Information to us, you are providing your consent for us to collect, use and disclose your Personal Information as described in this policy. If you provide us with Personal Information about others, you represent that you have obtained their consent for us to collect, use and disclose their Personal Information as described in this policy.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_35: We will make every reasonable effort to keep your Personal Information accurate and up to date.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_36: How is Personal Information used for online advertising?
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_37: By using our Platform, Google and other select advertisers may place cookies on your device. These cookies allow us to display online advertisements to those who visited our Platform. We cannot identify specific users with these cookies.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_38: Google can associate your browsing history, IP address and device information with your Google account to personalize ads; other advertisers can do the same. To better protect your privacy, and to prevent online advertising, you can:
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_40: update your Google ads settings; and,
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_42: Google Analytics is a tool used to collect your browsing history on our Platform. More information on Google Analytics is available by reviewing its Terms of Use and Google’s Privacy Policy.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_45: use all reasonable physical measures, technical tools, and organizational controls at our disposal to protect your Personal Information from misuse or inappropriate disclosures; and,
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_46: ensure through contracts that all third parties to which we transfer your Personal Information for processing comply with our privacy policy.
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_48: You are encouraged to contact our Compliance Officer, who is a member of our Senior Management, to:
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_49: answer any questions you may have with respect to our privacy policy;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_50: request access to your Personal Information in our control, including transcripts of recorded calls;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_51: correct any of your Personal Information that may be inaccurate;
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_52: address any complaints you may have about our use or disclosure of your Personal Information; and,
translations.intro_privacy_us:p:text_53: withdraw your consent to our use of your Personal Information.

Coverage purchased by credit card is subject to validation and acceptance by the credit card company. I agree to comply with the cardholder agreement and financial institution terms of use.

I understand that if payment is returned unpayable for any reason, the coverage becomes null and void. I also understand that any changes to this Application Form do not change the coverage of the Plan. I have read, understand, and agree to the terms and conditions of the Goose Domestic Plan, which has been made available to me.
translations.quote_terms_usa:modal:p:content_10: Notwithstanding any other terms under the Plan, the Company will not provide coverage for, will not make payments to, or provide any service or benefit to any insured, beneficiary or third party who may have any rights under the Plan to the extent that such coverage, payment, service or benefit, or any business activity of the insured would violate any applicable trade or economic sanctions law or regulation.
translations.quote_terms_usa:modal:p:content_12: Any person who knowingly and with intent to defraud any insurance company or other person files an application for insurance or a statement of claim containing any materially false information or conceals, for the purpose of misleading, information concerning any fact material thereto may be guilty of committing a fraudulent insurance act, which is a crime.

translations.us:pet_insurance:coverage:modal:pet_righ: What’s the right coverage for your pet?

We recommend getting the Accident and Illness coverage, since pets often suffer from a wide variety of conditions (including cancer) - for which the treatment can be costly.

However, the Accident only coverage could be the right option for you if you’re already under a pet illness plan elsewhere.

translations.renters_optional_coverages:p:card_bedbug:
• 	Up $500 reimbursed to the insured if they cannot inhabit their property and incur additional living expenses and up to $1000 to the Property Management company if a licensed exterminator confirms live bed bugs and exterminates.

• 	Coverage includes reasonable cost incurred by you, up to the Aggregate Sublimit of Liability for Bed Bug Remediation Expense and Damage to Property of Others, to treat, remediate and eliminate a bed bug infestation in the residence premises. Please refer to your policy for coverage details.
translations.renters_optional_coverages:p:card_water_:
• 	Our renter’s insurance policy offers water or sewer backup which pays for damage to your personal property as a result of water that backs up through sewers or drains.

• 	Water/Sewer Coverage covers damages to a Resident’s possessions when water backs up from a sewer or sump pump. This endorsement applies when there is an issue with the sewage line from the street that causes the sewage to flow back into the apartment. It does not cover flooding, seepage, etc.

• 	The Water Backup coverage covers up to $5,000 in all states except Alaska where the maximum benefit is $2,500. We are required to offer this coverage for your full policy limits in Maryland.

• 	All other peril deductible applies except in Maryland where deductible is $250.
translations.renters_optional_coverages:p:card_pet_mo:
•	This endorsement covers up to $500 in excess of security deposit or special pet damage deposit for damage caused to the landlord's property by the tenant's pet.

•	Pet Damage coverage offers you $500 in liability coverage in the event of Pet Damage to the apartment. This endorsement applies after the pet deposit and security deposit has been exhausted.

•	A security or pet deposit is required for coverage to exist except North Carolina.
translations.renters_optional_coverages:p:card_earthq:
•	This endorsement provides $5,000 in personal property coverage with a $1,500 limit for additional living expenses. Earthquake deductible is $750.

•	The Earthquake Deductible is a percentage of the Contents limit. If the Contents limit is $10,000 and the deductible is 15%, the deductible amount is $1,500. If the deductible % is 25% then the deductible amount is $2,500.

translations.intro_terms_referral_ca:p:text:
Goose Insurance Services (“Goose”) offers a referral program (“Referral Program”) through which a registered user (“Member”) can be entered for a a chance to win a prize (“Prize”) by referring friends and family members. Prizes vary in value and will be offered at the sole discretion of Goose Insurance Services Inc. To participate in the Referral Program, the Member must agree to the terms and conditions described below. Goose may change these terms and conditions at any time.

Entry to Win:

The Member can be entered to win  by sending a personalized link (“Link”) generated by the Goose mobile app or website (“Platform”) to their friends and family members. The Member can send the link in a variety of ways, including emails, social media posts, or text messages.
For each friend or family referred who uses this Link to create a new and valid account on the Platform, the Member receives an entry into winning th draw.  Goose retains the right not to award Prizes for a duplicate or invalid account.

The Draw & Chances of Winning:

The draw will happen first week of each month for all eligible members that were successfully entered the previous calender month. The draw will happen at Goose Insurance Services Inc.’s head offices located at 800 - 1281 West Georgia Street, Vancouver BC V3E 3J7 Canada.
The chances of winning the draw is solely dependent on the number of entries received.
The Member can contact referral.program@gooseinsurance.com for any questions or inquiries they may have.

Important notices

This Referral Program is intended for personal use. The Member should only share their Link with personal connections who are interested in the products and services offered by Goose. The Member should not share their Link in public forums, like coupon websites or discussion boards.
If Goose determines that the Member is not complying with these terms and conditions, then Goose retains the right to suspend a Members  account.
Goose has the sole discretion to terminate this program without notice at any time.

The undersigned on behalf of themselves and any dependents (“Applicants”) that hereby apply and subscribe to the Global Medical Services Group, Carmel, IN, or its successor, for the insurance coverage requested above and as underwritten and offered by Sirius International Insurance Corporation (publ) (the Company) on the date of receipt hereof and as administered by the Company’s authorized representative and plan administrator, International Medical Group, Inc. (IMG).

The Applicants understand and agree: (i) the insurance applied for is not an employee welfare benefit plan, accident & health product, health insurance, major medical, nor a health plan subject to or complying with U.S. laws, but is intended for use as travel coverage in the event of a sudden and unexpected illness or injury for which eligible coverage may be available, (ii) The Applicants must pay premiums for the entire period of coverage in advance, and no coverage will be effective until the required premium has been paid and this application has been accepted in writing by the Company, (iii) no modification or waiver relating to this application or the coverage applied for will be binding upon the Company or IMG unless approved in writing by an officer of the Company or IMG, and (iv) the Company relies on the accuracy, truthfulness, and completeness of the information provided herein and any misrepresentation or omission contained herein will void the insurance contract and any and all claims and benefits thereunder will be forfeited and waived.

translations.life:healthinfo:p:title: Health Info. 🍎
translations.life:healthinfo:p:description: We are simplifying Life Insurance! No medical exams, no needles, and no waiting periods. In order for us to do this, we require to access some of your health information. This information along with your responses to the health questions will be used to determine your eligibility for Life Insurance.
translations.life:healthinfo:authorization:title: Authorization Details
translations.life:healthinfo:authorization:descriptio:
AUTHORIZATION FOR THE RELEASE OF MEDICAL RECORDS\nOccidental Life
Insurance of North Carolina
(here after referred to as the Company)

This Authorization complies with the HIPAA Privacy Rules

The Authorization must be fully completed as a condition of obtaining coverage. A refusal to sign this authorization will result in a rejection of your application for the insurance. A copy of this authorization will be considered as valid as the original.

1. I hereby authorize the following person(s) or group of persons to disclose information to the company: Any and all physicians, medical practitioners, hospitals, clinics, medical or medically-related facilities, health plans, pharmacy benefit managers, pharmacies or pharmacy-related facilities; insurance companies and their business associates and those persons or entities providing services to the insurers’ business associates which are related in any way to their insurance plans.

2. This authorization specifically includes the release of all medical records including without limitation those containing information relating to diagnoses, treatments, consultation, care, advice, laboratory or diagnostic tests, physical examinations, recommendations for future care, prescription drug information, alcohol or drug abuse, mental illness or information regarding communicable or infectious conditions, such as HIV and/or AIDS.

3. Person(s) or group of persons authorized to receive and use the information: The Company and its business associates and those persons or entities providing services to the Company plans.

4. The information will be used to make enrollment/eligibility for benefit determinations, specifically including, but not limited to, underwriting and risk rating determinations. If coverage is issued, such determinations may include determinations as to whether coverage should be rescinded or reformed if I have made any material omission(s) or misrepresentation(s) in my application.

5. I understand that any information that is disclosed pursuant to this authorization may be redisclosed and no longer covered by federal rules governing privacy and confidentiality of health information.

6. I understand that I may revoke this authorization in writing at any time, except to the extent that action has been taken in reliance on this authorization or the insurance company exercises a legal right to contest a claim or the policy itself. I may revoke the authorization by sending a written revocation to the Company address of 425 Austin Ave, Waco TX 76701.

7. I understand that if I refuse to confirm this authorization to release my complete medical records, my application for insurance with the Company will be rejected.

8. This authorization will expire 24 months after the date confirmed.

translations.termlife_insurance:term_length_modal:p:t: Term Length is a fixed period of years for which your Life Insurance premium will be guaranteed. translations.life:modal_confirmation_agreement_detail:
I agree with Goose Insurance Services Inc. (the Agency) and Occidental Life Insurance Company of North Carolina (the Company) as follows:

(1) To the best of my knowledge and belief, all answers and statements contained in this application are true, complete and correctly recorded; and

(2) This application and any policy issued on the basis of such application shall form the entire contract; and

(3) No change in this contract shall be effected without my written consent with regard to: (a) the amount of insurance; (b) age at issue; (c) classification of risk; (d) plan of insurance; or (e) benefits.

If this application is declined by the Company, I will accept the return of any premium paid to the Agency. Any person who knowingly presents a false statement in an application for insurance may be guilty of a criminal offense and subject to penalties under state law.

translations.quote_terms_international:modal:p:conten: The Applicants understand and agree that: (i) the insurance producer/agent/broker soliciting, assigned to, or assisting with this application is the agent and representative of Applicants and IMG acts in fulfillment of its contractual duties to the Company and on behalf of the Company, (ii) the insurance does not provide benefits for charges resulting directly or indirectly from or relating to any Pre-existing Condition are excluded from coverage under this insurance except and unless the charges resulted directly from an Acute Onset of Pre-existing Condition, in which case the charges will be covered only according to the terms of an Acute Onset of Pre-existing Conditions provision, and that all charges and/ or claims incurred for pre-existing conditions will be excluded from coverage as described in the Certificate of Insurance, (iii) the subjects of insurance applied for are not intended or considered by the applicants, the Company or IMG to be resident, located, or expressly to be performed in any particular jurisdiction, and (iv) the Company, as carrier and underwriter of the insurance plan, is solely liable for the coverages and benefits to be provided under the insurance contract and IMG has no direct or independent liability under any insurance contract, (v) the Applicants also agree it is their responsibility to provide IMG with true, accurate and complete e-mail address, contact, and other information related to my coverage, and to maintain and promptly update any changes in this information. Any person who knowingly presents a false or fraudulent claim for payment of a loss or benefit or knowingly presents false information in an application for insurance is guilty of a crime and may be subject to fines and confinement in prison.

The Applicants hereby certify, represent and warrant that : (i) they have read the foregoing statements and any marketing materials and sample insurance contract which were made available upon request and prior to the application or that they have been read to them, and the Applicants understand them, (ii) they are eligible to participate in the insurance program applied for as a traveler for whom domestic U.S. health care coverage is unavailable, (iii) they are currently in good health and have not been diagnosed with, sought consultation or been treated for, and have not experienced manifestation or symptoms of and do not suffer from any pre-existing or other medical condition which the Applicants foresee may require treatment during the insurance or for which the Applicants intend to claim under the insurance, and (iv) each Applicant is not hospitalized, disabled, or HIV+. If signed as the legal representative of the Applicant, the signer warrants their authority and capacity to so act and to bind each applicant. By acceptance of coverage and/or submission of any claim for benefits, each applicant ratifies the authority of the signer to so act and bind the Applicants.

Details about why and how we use personal information is found here in our
translations.signup:modal:p:why_signup_text_2: After this initial signup process, most people appreciate the ease with which you can learn about, quote and buy our insurance products. It's becoming the preferred way to introduce customers to a Company's product offerings. You won't be asked for payment information until you've decided to make a purchase.

translations.covid_auto_renewal:modal:p:text: By selecting 'Auto Renew', you consent to Goose automatically renewing your policy upon expiry by charging a valid credit card on your account that you have provided. You will receive an email notification at least 30 days before the expiration of the current policy.

translations.ca:my_policies:my_policies:p:cancellatio:
Your Travel Insurance policy can be cancelled and may be fully refunded if cancellation requests are received within the 10 day free look period as long as you haven't travelled. Please note that all travel insurance policies are subject to a $25 minimum retained premium. 

Trip Cancellation and Trip Interruption policies are not refundable.
translations.ca:my_policies:my_policies:p:pandemic_ca: Your COVID-19 (Pandemic) policy can be cancelled and may be fully refunded if cancellation requests are received within the 10 day free look period as long as you haven't travelled.

translations.life:bind_stop:p:text_2: You’re still eligible for an Accidental Death & Dismemberment Insurance for up to $200,000!
translations.singletrip_top_up:p:description: You can top-up another existing Canadian insurance provider policy to cover you beyond the trip length of that specific policy. For example, you may have had a group health plan that offers up to 15-day coverage, but your trip is for 20 days. A top-up policy will add on to your existing coverage for the additional 5 days.
